amendment.description: An amendment to add a paragraph prohibiting use of funds for review of the application for the Broadwater Energy Proposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph prohibiting use of funds for review of the application for the Broadwater Energy Proposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 285, 1 Present (Roll no. 521).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
